channel.title: I need help uploading a pic
channel.description: Hey, I'm trying to find the part in the forums where I can see pictures and upload pics. Thank you.

item.title: I need help uploading a pic
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“USMC, post:2, topic:3640”]hmm… not sure… what you mean but…
when you make a new post, hit “Additional Options…” then you can attach any of the following file extensions: doc, gif, jpg, mpg, pdf, png, txt, zip, java, scar, scp, rar, jar, jpeg, bmp

kthxbye[/quote]

[offtopic spam]
Your sig gave me a headache trying to figure it out. I’m not joking. [/off topic spam]

Read full topic
item.source: I need help uploading a pic
